name: Tamil Stickers : WAStickerApps, vadivelu stickers
description: Tamil Stickers for WhatsApp is a sticker app by which you can send Funny and comedy stickers for a better conversation in WhatsApp. This app contains various packages like,   Nesamani Stickers   Thala ajith Stickers   Thalapathi vijay Stickers   Vadivelu Collection 1  Vadivelu Collection 2  Dhilluku Thuttu - 2  Natpe Thunai  Meesaya Murukku  Anirudh Stickers   SK & Soori  Go-Su Sticker Pack 1  Go-Su Sticker Pack 2  Black Sheep Stickers  Erumai Saani  Mic Set  Jump Cuts Pack 1  Jump Cuts Pack 2  Nakkalites  Being Tamilan Stickers   And soon more stickers will be added... Have a great and fun conversation.  Icon Designed by twitter.com/dhanush_05
